message:
Thought I'd like to a few key blogposts... things that have really made me re-evaluate what I'm doing with CS

* The Web Is a Customer Service Medium -- Paul Ford -- http://www.ftrain.com/wwic.html

* Content Strategy: The Philosophy of Data -- Rachel Lovinger -- http://www.boxesandarrows.com/view/content-strategy-the

* The Discipline of Content Strategy — Kristina Halvorson — http://www.alistapart.com/articles/thedisciplineofcontentstrategy

* All 'A List Apart' articles on Content Strategy -- various -- http://www.alistapart.com/topics/content/content-strategy
